summary: Zeitgeist explores the spirit of the times, capturing the cultural, intellectual, and political climate of a particular era. It often intersects with trends in biology, decentralized systems, and the internet. Modern zeitgeist transcends traditional boundaries and emphasizes the move towards less hierarchical structures, driven by advancements in technology and new organizational models.
excerpt: An ecosystem in biology involves organisms interacting within a specific area. Its overuse in other contexts reflects a desire for less hierarchical structures. Modern ecosystems transcend space-time.
